description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 3 (Materials) of Planning Permission 21/01555/FUL (Proposed works to parapet wall to existing school building) to allow for the following changes:  Change colour of new GRP trim being installed to edge of existing parapet wall from grey to black.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of planning permission 21/01555/FUL.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: SCHOS Name: Grand Avenue School Playing Field
